channel.title: NYS:UNH on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in NYS:UNH on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: UnitedHealth Issues Fresh Guidance Below Wall Street Estimates
item.description: UnitedHealth Group Inc. set a new earnings target below Wall Street’s estimates for the year, another sign of difficulty for the health-care giant as it tries to regain investors’ confidence.

item.title: UnitedHealth Issues Fresh Guidance Below Wall Street Estimates
item.description: UnitedHealth Group Inc. set a new earnings target below Wall Street’s estimates for the year, another sign of difficulty for the health-care giant as it tries to regain investors’ confidence.

item.title: UnitedHealth Sets Guidance Lower Than Forecast; Shares Fall
item.description: UnitedHealth Group Inc. set a new earnings target below Wall Street’s estimates for the year, a fresh disappointment for the health-care giant as it tries to regain investors’ confidence.
